name: Luke Cage
text: Impenetrable Skin — Damage cannot be healed from Luke Cage other than using his REC. Setup: Give Luke Cage a tough status card. “You look like you could use some help. I'm for hire.”

name: Luke Cage
text: Impenetrable Skin — Damage cannot be healed from Luke Cage. Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, reduce that amount by 1. “Sweet Christmas!”

name: Jessica Jones
text: [star] Interrupt: When Jessica Jones thwarts, discard he top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon discarded this way, Jessica Jones gets +1 THW for this use. If no boost icons were discarded, Jessica Jones takes no consequential damage for this thwart. different types → deal 2 damage to an enemy and return Red Dagger to your hand.

name: Beatdown
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill. This attack deals 1 additional damage for each [physical] resource you used to pay or overpay for this card. “When I knock you down, you're gonna stay down!”

name: Community Outreach
text: Action: Remove 1 threat from a scheme. Draw 1 card (2 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form). Your hero gets +1 THW until the end of the round. “I'm just a New Yorker like you. And if someone's in trouble, I do what New Yorkers do: I help.” —Luke Cage

name: In Harm's Way
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an identity would take any amount of damage, prevent 2 of that damage and draw 1 card. If no damage was taken this way, remove 1 threat from a scheme. “Get behind me!” —Luke Cage

name: Unbreakable
text: Hero Action: Give Luke Cage a tough status card. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, you may shuffle this card into your deck. “Did you do your "I-don't-break" speech? I love that one.” —Jessica Jones

name: Luke's Apartment
text: Luke Cage gets +1 REC (+2 REC instead if Jessica Jones or Luke's Family is in play). Alter-Ego Response: After you use your REC, discard 1 card → give Luke Cage a tough status card.

name: Luke's Family
text: You get +1 hand size. “Dani and Jess? They're my whole world.” —Luke Cage

name: Bulletproof
text: You get +3 hit points. Attacks against Luke Cage lose piercing. Response: After you gain a tough status card, ready Luke Cage. “I got skin like steel and muscles to match.” —Luke Cage

name: Luke's Bracers
text: Luke Cage requires 2 stunned status cards to be stunned. While in hero form, Luke Cage gains retaliate 1. “I used to wear a big metal tiara. Why? Because look at me. I could. And if not me, then who?” —Luke Cage

name: Super Strength
text: Your hero gets +1 ATK. Resource: Exhaust Super Strength → generate a [physical] resource. “They don't call Ol' Luke Cage "Power Man" for nothin'!” —Luke Cage
